code: import axios from'axios';const API_BASE_URL='http://localhost:5000/api';export const fetchTodos=()=>axios.get(`${API_BASE_URL}/todos`);export const createTodo=title=>axios.post(`${API_BASE_URL}/todos`,{title});export const updateTodo=(id,data)=>axios.put(`${API_BASE_URL}/todos/${id}`,data);export const deleteTodo=id=>axios.delete(`${API_BASE_URL}/todos/${id}`);
